name: Dinogotchi
description:
have you ever wished to pet a dino? Then dinogotchi is a perfect fit for you! In this tamagotchi-like game, you'll take care of cute dinosaurs since their birth and watch them grow and evolve then into new species, play minigames and give lots of love to your little pre-historic friends! Oh, and they will not eat you, i guarantee ;D



  • You can pet the dinosaurs
  • 15 total dinos to take care
  • Evolve your dinos
  • Simple mechanics
  • 2 fun Minigames to play
